permissions: User must be an admin or an admin member of the broker organization associated with the project division.
side_effects: Creates a project division record associated with the specified broker.
validation_notes: Name is required and must be unique within the broker (case-insensitive). Abbreviation is required by the server and must be unique within the broker (case-insensitive). Broker is required.

flags.name: --abbreviation
flags.validation: Required by server; must be unique within the broker (case-insensitive).

flags.name: --name
flags.validation: Required; must be unique within the broker (case-insensitive).
